statements: SELECT * FROM customer_support_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_support_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_content FROM customer_support_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_interactions WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_support_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint';
SELECT * FROM customer_support_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM customer_support_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_support_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Feedback', 'Query') ORDER BY customer_id, interaction_date;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id DESC, interaction_date;

SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_content FROM customer_support_interactions WHERE customer_id = 200 AND interaction_content LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_summary FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_summary FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM interaction_trends WHERE trend_timeframe >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM interaction_trends ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint'
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_summary FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC

SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date, trend_name FROM customer_interactions JOIN interaction_trends ON customer_interactions.customer_id = interaction_trends.trend_id WHERE interaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_id ASC
SELECT count(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions
SELECT AVG(interaction_id) AS avg_interaction_id FROM customer_interactions
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM customer_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'Phone Call';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_role FROM support_agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_score, feedback_comment FROM interaction_feedback WHERE feedback_score > 3;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_interaction WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction WHERE customer_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
SELECT * FROM customer_interaction ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interaction GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM support_agents WHERE agent_role = 'Support Specialist';
SELECT * FROM interaction_feedback WHERE feedback_score > 3 ORDER BY feedback_score DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM support_agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT issue_id, issue_type, issue_description FROM support_issues WHERE issue_type = 'Technical';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Phone Call' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM support_agents WHERE agent_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 AND feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT interaction_date, issue_type FROM customer_interactions JOIN support_issues ON customer_interactions.interaction_id = support_issues.interaction_id WHERE issue_type = 'Technical' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM agents WHERE agent_department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_priority DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM interactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM agents ORDER BY agent_department ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, ticket_category FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open' AND ticket_priority = 'High';
SELECT feedback_desc, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
